titleStmt.title: Poems and translations with the Sophy / written by the Honourable Sir John Denham, Knight of the Bath.
titleStmt.author: Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669.
Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669. Sophy.
Virgil. Aeneis. Liber 2. English.

notesStmt.note: "The destruction of Troy : an essay upon the second book of Virgil's Aeneis" (p. [23]-67) and "The Sophy" ([4], 97, [1] p. at end) have special t.p.'s dated 1667.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
